description:
The premier webOS client for the Chicago Transit Authority Bus Tracker system. Conveniently access routes, stops and estimated arrivals directly from your device through a quick and elegant interface. Not sure where exactly the closest bus stop is? find it in map view.Take the guess work out of your commute! 
 
TIPS: 
• Just Type to search routes & stops lists.
• Meta-tap + reload to open a new card.
• Meta-tap to edit a favorite.
 
NOTES:
Data provided by the CTA. Location services performance is contingent on physical location and/or Carrier limitations. Issues are best resolved via support email. This application may not function correctly outside the central timezone.

FUTURE:
Support for CTA TrainTracker when it becomes publicly accessible.
